amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Defense to assess and report to Congress the costs to the United States associated with the location of the headquarters of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) in Brussels, Belgium and the costs and benefits of relocating that headquarters to a suitable location in another NATO member country.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 108-120 to add a new section to the bill requiring submission of a report on assessment concerning the location of NATO headquarters.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goss amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
